quote: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
name: George Santayana

quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Confucius

quote: We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: History never really says goodbye. History says, 'See you later.'
name: Eduardo Galeano

quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
name: George Washington

quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
name: Karl Marx

quote: Legend remains victorious in spite of history.
name: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: All of us have a place in history. Mine is clouds.
name: Richard Brautigan

quote: It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition.
name: Henry James

quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: History is the version of past events that people have decided to agree upon.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I came, I saw, I conquered.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: The library is the temple of learning, and learning has liberated more people than all the wars in history.
name: Carl T. Rowan

quote: There is nothing new in the world except the history you do not know.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: The history of all previous societies has been the history of class struggles.
name: Karl Marx

quote: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: History will decide if I'm a villain or a hero.
name: Harlan Ellison

quote: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history.
name: Debi Mazar

quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: Be as a tower firmly set; Shakes not its top for any blast that blows.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: The problem is that my generation was pacified into believing that racism existed only in our history books.

quote: I love history... everything is inspired by history, so that's why I love vintage and antiques.

quote: History proves that the white man is a devil.

quote: The history of innovation is the story of ideas that seemed dumb at the time.

quote: History is a vast early warning system.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Legend: A lie that has attained the dignity of age.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Condemn me. It does not matter. History will absolve me.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: The very concept of objective truth is fading out of the world. Lies will pass into history.
name: George Orwell

quote: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality.

quote: History, in general, only informs us of what bad government is.

quote: The very ink with which history is written is merely fluid prejudice.

quote: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made.

quote: History in its broadest aspect is a record of man's migrations from one environment to another.

quote: History is written by the victors.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: History does not long entrust the care of freedom to the weak or the timid.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The more you know of your history, the more liberated you are.

name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: The invention of the printing press was one of the most important events in human history.

quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: A world without nuclear weapons would be less stable and more dangerous for all of us.

quote: The institution of chivalry forms one of the most remarkable features in the history of the Middle Ages.

quote: History shows that there are no invincible armies.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: The people who have really made history are the martyrs.
name: Aleister Crowley

quote: What is history? An echo of the past in the future; a reflex from the future on the past.

quote: Neither current events nor history show that the majority rule, or ever did rule.

quote: If history were taught in the form of stories, it would never be forgotten.

name: H. G. Wells

name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind.

quote: History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul.

quote: Malaria has long been a devastating and life-threatening global epidemic disease in human history.
name: Tu Youyou

quote: An Edwardian lady in full dress was a wonder to behold, and her preparations for viewing were awesome.
name: William Manchester

quote: History is a tool used by politicians to justify their intentions.
name: Ted Koppel

quote: That great dust-heap called 'history'.
name: Augustine Birrell
